==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|かく|じつ|yomi=on}}

===Adjectival noun===
{{ja-adj|infl=na|かくじつ}}

# [[certain]], [[reliable]]
#: この人に順えば'''確実'''だ。
#:: ''kono hito ni shitagaeba '''kakujitsu''' da.''
#:: He is a '''reliable''' fellow.
# certain, [[inevitable]], [[necessary]]
#: 外務大臣の辞任は'''確実'''だ。
#:: ''gaimu daijin no jinin wa '''kakujitsu''' da.''
#:: The resignation of the foreign minister is '''inevitable'''.

====Usage notes====
Used particularly of sources of information (“trustworthiness”), rather than for physical activities, such as bus services, for which {{m|ja|確か}} is used instead.

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|reliable}} [[確か]], [[当てになる]]
* {{sense|inevitable}} [[必至]], [[必然的]]

====Antonyms====
* {{sense|reliable}} [[不確実]], [[当てにならない]]
* {{sense|inevitable}} [[不可能]], [[可能]], [[偶発的]]

====Compounds====
* [[確実性]]
* [[確実度]]
